content.question: The use of a diptych as a compositional device suggests that Warhol likely wanted viewers to respond to the work as

choices.label: a symbolic representation of feminine beauty
an immortal tribute to a revered and iconic figure
an image evoking the fleeting passage of time
a product of mass consumption and marketing

content.answer: an immortal tribute to a revered and iconic figure

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
